TunableTuple.name: ACTIVE_LIGHTNING
TunableTuple.description: Lightning information for active strikes.

TunableList.name: creation_metrics
TunableList.description: Metrics for determining how bolts are created at differing ambient lightning ranges.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of ambient lightning range to metrics.

Tunable.name: chance
Tunable.description: Chance of spawning active lightning each check.

TunableTuple.name: interval
TunableTuple.description: Range of minutes between creation checks at this amount of ambient lightning.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: value_range
TunableTuple.description: Ambient lightning range within which this metric is applied

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: COUNTS_AS_SHADE
TunableList.description: A set of WeatherTypes that count as shade as far as is sun out is concerned.

TunableEnum.name: EXTREME_COLD_WEATHER_TYPE
TunableEnum.description: The weather type enum that is for extreme cold. UI needs this tuning.

TunableEnum.name: EXTREME_HEAT_WEATHER_TYPE
TunableEnum.description: The weather type enum that is for extreme heat. UI needs this tuning.

Tunable.name: FALLBACK_FORECAST
Tunable.description: The weather forecast to use if no valid forecast is found.

Tunable.name: FROST_GROUND_ACCUMULATION_MAX
Tunable.description: Maximum amount of accumulation for ground frost.

TunableTuple.name: FROST_WINDOW_MELT_RATE
TunableTuple.description: Rate per minute at each temperature that window frost melts. Negative means it accumulates.

TunableTuple.name: ICY_CONDITIONS
TunableTuple.description: Icy conditions specific tuning.

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: The amount of time (in sim mins) to run icy conditions for.

Tunable.name: start_in
Tunable.description: The amount of time (in sim mins) to the start Icy conditions from stop of snow accumulation.

Tunable.name: time_to_icy
Tunable.description: The amount of time (in sim mins) to from 0 to full ICY.

Tunable.name: time_to_icy_decay
Tunable.description: The amount of time (in sim mins) to from full ICY (or current value) to zero.

TunableList.name: whitelisted_temperatures
TunableList.description: Temperatures for which we allow Icy conditions.

TunableList.name: OUTDOOR_AUTONOMY_RAIN_PENALTIES
TunableList.description: A list of penalties modifiers for outside autonomy when it is raining. score = score - score * modifier i.e. is sims score outside interactions at 10% of normal when it's 80-100 precipitation, then range would be 80-100, modifier would be 0.9

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of precipitation range to modifier.

Tunable.name: modifier
Tunable.description: Multiplier to autonomy score by.

TunableTuple.name: value_range
TunableTuple.description: Precipitation range within which this penalty is applied

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: OUTDOOR_AUTONOMY_RAIN_PENALTY_REDUCTIONS
TunableList.description: A mapping of traits to penalty modifiers for rain. score = score - score * modifier * penalty reduction modifier i.e. if sim with the likes the outdoors trait is only half as affected by the precipitation, key would be the likes the outdoors trait, value would be 0.5

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The trait the receives this modifier.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: Multiplier to modify penalty by.

TunableList.name: OUTDOOR_AUTONOMY_SNOW_PENALTIES
TunableList.description: A list of penalties for outside autonomy when it is snowing. score = score - score*modifier i.e. is sims score outside interactions at 10% of normal when it's 80-100 precipitation, then range would be 80-100, modifier would be 0.9

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of precipitation range to modifier.

Tunable.name: modifier
Tunable.description: Multiplier to autonomy score by.

TunableTuple.name: value_range
TunableTuple.description: Precipitation range within which this penalty is applied

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: OUTDOOR_AUTONOMY_SNOW_PENALTY_REDUCTIONS
TunableList.description: score = score - score * modifier * penalty reduction modifier i.e. if sim with the likes the outdoors trait is only half as affected by the precipitation, key would be the likes the outdoors trait, value would be 0.5

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The trait the receives this modifier.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: Multiplier to modify penalty by.

TunableTuple.name: PUDDLES
TunableTuple.description: Puddle information

TunableList.name: creation_metrics
TunableList.description: metrics for determining how puddles are created at differing precipitation ranges.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of precipitation range to metrics.

Tunable.name: chance
Tunable.description: Chance of spawning puddle each check.

TunableTuple.name: interval
TunableTuple.description: Range of minutes between creation checks at this amount of precipitation.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: value_range
TunableTuple.description: Precipitation range within which this metric is applied

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: max
Tunable.description: Maximum number of rain-based puddles to exist at one time.

TunableList.name: natural_terrain_definitions
TunableList.description: This is a list of associated tests and lists of definitions that will be used to create a puddle on natural terrain. i.e. mud puddles. All of the definitions in the list will be considered valid if all of the tests in the test set pass.

TunableTuple.description: A list of definitions paired with a set of tests. The tests must pass for the definitions in the list to be considered valid for creating a puddle on natural terrain. i.e. mud puddles.

TunableList.name: definitions
TunableList.description: Definitions for which puddles can be created when associated tests pass.

Tunable.description: The definition of the object.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: Set of tests that must pass in order for the associated definitions in the definition list to be considered valid for puddle creation.

TunableEnum.description: The set of tags that are used to determine which objects are treated as rain-based puddles.

TunableList.name: unnatural_terrain_definitions
TunableList.description: This is a list of associated tests and lists of definitions that will be used to create a puddle on natural terrain. i.e. water puddles. All of the definitions in the list will be considered valid if all of the tests in the test set pass.

TunableTuple.description: A set of definitions paired with a set of tests. The tests must pass for the definitions in the list to be considered valid for creating a puddle on unnatural terrain. i.e. water puddles.

TunableList.name: definitions
TunableList.description: Definitions for which puddles can be created when associated tests pass.

Tunable.description: The definition of the object.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: Set of tests that must pass in order for the associated definitions in the definition list to be considered valid for puddle creation.

Tunable.name: SNOW_ACCUMULATION_RATE
Tunable.description: Rate per minute per target precipitation amount that snow accumulates. i.e. 0.03 means ~30 minutes to 100 coverage in 100 snow.

TunableTuple.name: SNOW_DRIFT
TunableTuple.description: Snow drift information

TunableList.name: creation_metrics
TunableList.description: metrics for determining how drifts are created at differing precipitation ranges.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of precipitation range to metrics.

Tunable.name: chance
Tunable.description: Chance of spawning drift each check.

TunableTuple.name: interval
TunableTuple.description: Range of minutes between creation checks at this amount of precipitation.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: value_range
TunableTuple.description: Precipitation range within which this metric is applied

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: definitions
TunableList.description: Definitions for which objects to be created as snow drifts

Tunable.description: The definition of the object.

Tunable.name: max
Tunable.description: Maximum number of snow drifts to exist at one time.

TunableEnum.description: The set of tags that are used to determine which objects are treated as snow drifts.

Tunable.name: SNOW_FRESHNESS_ACCUMULATION_RATE
Tunable.description: Rate per minute per target precipitation amount that snow freshness accumulates. Snow freshness decay rate is subtracted from this to get the final decay/accumulation rate. i.e. 0.02 here with 1.0 freshness decay means it'll take 100 minutes to accumulate to full at 100 snow. (100 * 0.02 = 2.0 rate. 2.0 accumulation rate - 1.0 decay rate = final rate 1.0. And at 50 precipitation the two rates will precisely cancel out.

Tunable.name: SNOW_FRESHNESS_DECAY_RATE
Tunable.description: Rate per minute that snow freshness decays. This is subtracted from the calculated accumulation rate to get the final decay/accumulation rate. At 1 this means it'll take 100 minutes to go from full freshness to full decay.

TunableTuple.name: SNOW_MELT_RATE
TunableTuple.description: Rate per minute at each temperature that snow melts. Negative means it accumulates (i.e. frost) up to the frost limit

Tunable.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_BUFF
Tunable.description: If the enable temperature effects on Sims option is disabled, this buff is applied to Sims.

Tunable.name: WATER_ACCUMULATION_RATE
Tunable.description: Rate per minute per target precipitation amount that water accumulates. i.e. 0.03 means ~30 minutes to 100 coverage in 100 rain.

TunableTuple.name: WATER_EVAPORATION_RATE
TunableTuple.description: Rate per minute at each temperature that water evaporates.

TunableTuple.name: WATER_THAW_RATE
TunableTuple.description: Rate per minute at each temperature that water thaws. Negative means it freezes.

Tunable.name: WEATHER_AWARE_TIME_SLICE_SECONDS
Tunable.description: The maximum alloted time for updating weather aware objects between time slices in seconds.

TunableList.name: WEATHER_ENDING_EVENT
TunableList.description: Tuning information on event that can happen when a specific weather is done.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: Weather type that when completed will trigger additional functionality.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Information about event that should happen when the specified weather ends.

TunableVariant.name: event_type
TunableVariant.description: Possible ingredient mapping by object definition of by catalog object Tag.

TunableTuple.name: spawn_rainbow
TunableTuple.description: Handles finding the location and creation of rainbows in the world.

Tunable.name: rainbow_definition
Tunable.description: Rainbow definition to be placed on the world.

Tunable.name: spawn_max_radius
Tunable.description: Max radius around the spawner object to search to place the new object.

TunableEnum.description: The set of tags that define the objects where the new object should try to position itself.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: Tests to run to validate if the placement of the rainbow should be valid. This will run over the object being placed, so any object tests will be valid.

Tunable.name: trigger_chance
Tunable.description: Chance of spawning drift each check.

TunableList.name: WEATHER_OUFTIT_CHANGE_REASONS_TO_IGNORE
TunableList.display: Weather Ouftit Change Reasons To Ignore
TunableList.description: A list of outfit change reasons that are exempt from testing for weather.

TunableTuple.name: WEATHER_OUTFIT_TESTS
TunableTuple.description: A default weather outfit test and a list of tests to use instead of the default test for specific outfit change reasons.

TunableList.name: default_outfit_change_tests
TunableList.description: A map of outfit category to test set. If the test set passes a Sim will change outfit to the corresponding outfit category. This is the default set of tests that is run to determine outfit change behavior based on weather.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The outfit category to set if the test set passes

TdescFragTag.name: value
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

TunableList.name: outfit_change_reason_tests
TunableList.description: The tests to run insted of the default test for specific outfit change reasons.

TunableList.name: outfit_change_reasons
TunableList.description: The list of outfit change reasons for which we use the specific tests instead of the default test.

TunableList.name: outfit_change_tests
TunableList.description: A map of outfit category to test set. If the test set passes a Sim will change outfit to the corresponding outfit category.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The outfit category to set if the test set passes

TdescFragTag.name: value
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

TunableVariant.name: WEATHER_TYPE_EXCLUSIVE_TEST
TunableVariant.description: Tests that specify the exclusive weather type based on the current weather.

TunableTuple.name: single_entry
TunableTuple.description: Leaf node of the Exclusive Weather Type tree

TunableList.name: WEATHER_TYPE_MULTIPLE_TEST
TunableList.description: Tests that specify which non-exclusive weather types are true based on the current weather.

TdescFragTag.name: WeatherTypeTest
TdescFragTag.description: At least one of these must pass for weather type to be true based on the current weather. When test is true: WeatherEnumTest will return true for that enum. That enum will be sent to any objects with a weatheraware component listening for that enum.

TunableList.name: WEATHER_TYPE_UI_INFO
TunableList.description: Mapping of weather type enum to weather information. The information includes the list of tests for the weather type, the type of weather information and the corresponding UI information.

TunableTuple.name: WeatherTypeValue
TunableTuple.description: Test and UI information for this weather type.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon of the weather type.

Tunable.name: icon_large
Tunable.description: Large icon of the weather type, used on the weather tooltip.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of the weather type.

TunableEnum.name: weather_group_type
TunableEnum.description: What this weather type actually is. Weather VS temperature VS lightning state etc...
